remarks: If a nonempty finite friendship graph is k-regular, then it must have order 1 or 3.  Special case of ~ frgraregord013 .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Oct-2018.)
statement: frgraregord13 $p |- ( ( ( V FriendGrph E /\ V e. Fin /\ V =/= (/) ) /\ <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K ) -> ( ( # ` V ) = 1 \/ ( # ` V ) = 3 ) ) $.
